about_the_game:
VRidge connects your mobile device to your PC, transforming it into a powerful SteamVR-compatible virtual reality headset. It will then stream SteamVR apps to your mobile device as a high-performance video with full head and controller tracking. All you need is a mobile or cardboard VR viewer to enjoy the experience!
 

Getting started

  1. Install RiftCat client application on your computer via Steam.
  2. Install VRidge on your mobile device and place it inside your mobile VR viewer.
  3. Launch both apps.
  4. Follow the built-in instructions in the RiftCat application to connect them via WiFi.
  5. Enjoy!

Test your setup first

Try out your VRidge hardware setup with the Demo version to ensure everything works correctly before making a purchase.
detailed_description:
Adventure awaits you!

Use your phone to experience full 3D gaming with HTC Vive and Oculus Rift titles. Rediscover games like Minecraft, Elite Dangerous, Microsoft Flight Simulator, Project Cars, War Thunder and many more in virtual reality.

Affordable VR gaming solution

Pair VRidge with an inexpensive mobile VR headset like Google Cardboard and experience PC-based virtual reality gaming with an affordable price. You don't have to spend money upfront, start by testing everything out with the free demo.

Virtual Reality gaming in your hand

VRidge will make your PC think that your phone is an expensive HTC Vive, Valve Index or Oculus Rift headset. Download VRidge on both devices, connect them together and enjoy.

Rediscover your favorite games with GameWarp

Enhance your VR experience with VRidge's GameWarp addon, which enables you to play non-VR games with your virtual reality hardware. GameWarp technology lets you display the game in your headset and control it using your equipment.

GameWarp requires VRidge full version to run.


Original VRidge + GameWarp purchases

If you purchased the original VRidge before the Steam release, your license is still valid. You can download the legacy client at the bottom of RiftCat website to continue using it.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 8.1
  • Processor: i5-2500 equivalent or greater
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GeForce GTX 650 with NVENC support | AMD Radeon 7750 with VCE 1.0+ support or greater
  • Storage: 25 MB available space
  • VR Support: Any cardboard-compatible mobile viewer
  • Additional Notes: Android 5.0+ or iOS 12.1+ smartphone with gyroscope
